name: Achievement Hunter: Princess
description:
Achievement Hunter: Princess

In this 2d action / shooter you will play for the princess who wants to stop the snail who are trying to destroy his city.
You do not have any allies. There are only you, your gun and a huge number of snail.
Fight for your home, increase your skill, gun and prevent invasion of snail into your city.

Game features:
  • 5000 ACHIEVEMENTS
  • Minimum allowable price
  • Real gun
  • Fearless protagonist
